page.title: 08TRADE
page.content: THE LOCAL SHOP In our area there is only one shop owned by Mrs J Lees.This shop stocks most of the goods that people need such as food,cigarettes,alcohol and even clothes and toys. The shop has always been busy but recently one of the large chain stores,Fine Fare,has provided a free bus.This bus takes the villagers to Inverness which is about 35 miles from Hilton and there they shop in Fine Fare and return home on the stores bus. Because of falling trade ,Mrs Lees cannot afford to employ help in the shop or make improvements to it.Sh just earns enough to make a living. However in our village shop you will usually find a cheery shopkeeper who is always helpful.
